summary: Page 7 starts פרק שני with subtitle סוגי מצוות. Sections aleph through dalet of chapter 2 are captured. Section bet has multiple paragraphs with correct source refs. Section dalet is cut at the bottom continuing to next page. Chapter header and structure are correct.

issues.description: OCR reads 'וידוע מה שאמר התולדות שור' referencing a sefer. The actual sefer name is 'תבואות שור' (Tevuot Shor), a known halachic work. The OCR misread תבואות as תולדות.
The makor paragraph has no source_ref because section ד continues to the next page. The source ref appears on page 8's continuation fragment. Acceptable for cross-page sections.
